p: The drought measure used in this study is the monthly precipitation minus the PET (hereafter called the water balance). This monthly measure is drawn as an accumulation initialized at zero over each year in Fig 2. Months where the cumulative water balance goes below zero are considered to be in deficit. For the drought risk in Fig 3, only the months of May through August are considered and the risk is calculated as Eq ( 2) with n = 1,000 for every region, scenario, and time period. All results are comparisons relative to the simulations from baseline weather conditions. In this way, we make effort in controlling the effects of modeling assumptions.
